Text.val: ... prepare path/filename for CSV output file

SQL_STMT_U.val: select min (OLOG_TIME) from :1/OLOG where OLOG_DATE = ':2' and OLOG_USER = ':3' and OLOG_GM900P1_PID = 'OID705' and SUBSTRING (OLOG_GM900P3_SCRTITLE, 1, 9) like '%:4%' for fetch only

select cast(sum(INVO_AINITIALH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_SCHEDULEDATE <= ':3' and INVO_DUEDATE < ':3' and (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > ':3' or INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE is null) and INVO_SCHT_NO > 0 for fetch only
